details.title: 3-D-Printed Flat Optics for THz Linear Scanners
details.abstract: THz beam shaping via a single diffractive optical element is used to convert a divergent beam into a focal line segment perpendicular to the optical axis. The novel structure was designed for narrowband applications as a kinoform element and we successfully applied it in active, high-speed, THz linear scanners. The theoretical approach and experimental results are presented.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Terahertz Science and Technology
